thadiya me tharan katha karuweku bawa as ayi kasun dana sitiye natha..hum thamuselath karanne jobane..awulak na..eeth poddak mita wadiya hoyala balala liyanawa.adutharame apenwath ahanawa..nikamma rola arinne nathuwa..paththarakaraya awissima siya kunukandal nikamma awussa ganimak wiya haki bawa as ayige ali honda nuwanata(gana dewi nuwanata) kalpana wiya.ha ehenam yanawa.anik dawase liyanna kalin tikak balanawa aa....awulak ganna epa mama kathakale ara daru pawula ganayi,manda manasika lamayayi gana hithala.
